description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Application Object Library product of Oracle E-Business Suite (component: Core).  Supported versions that are affected are 12.2.3-12.2.14. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Application Object Library.  Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in  unauthorized read access to a subset of Oracle Application Object Library accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 5.3 (Confidentiality impacts).  CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N).
